channel.title: Lollll
channel.description:
This just happened on Frell's forums. I was there.
[quote="Bmxr4c3r709, post:32, topic:445"][quote author=MoparscapeHelp link=topic=528.msg2888#msg2888 date=1183394794] [quote author=Bmxr4c3r709 link=topic=528.msg2887#msg2887 date=1183394727] [quote author=Lin link=topic=528.msg2883#msg2883 date=1183394498]
Most of you think that it's a virus that slows down your computer, and to fix its speed you have to get rid of it. Well you don't, and I just found that out. Viruses generate things in your "Processes" (Can be accesed through Task Manager) and they generate things with a huge amount of memory. When I had my viruses, they kept on making IEXPLORER.EXE which were 20K-70K+ and truely slowed my computer down, and also enabled popups. And the more the space is, the more is adds to your computer, and the slower it goes. So just to let you all know, that's what really happens. And also remember, the virus doesn't slow you down, it's what it adds.
~Lin [/quote] A few ways to make it faster is by using disk clean up, disk defragmentor, or..... GET MORE RAM! ;) [/quote] or attaching c4 to it.. [/quote] Uhhhhh, idk that much about computers,;) what's c4?[/quote]

item.title: Lollll
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

This just happened on Frell’s forums.
I was there.

[quote=“Bmxr4c3r709, post:32, topic:445”][quote author=MoparscapeHelp link=topic=528.msg2888#msg2888 date=1183394794]

Most of you think that it’s a virus that slows down your computer, and to fix its speed you have to get rid of it. Well you don’t, and I just found that out. Viruses generate things in your “Processes” (Can be accesed through Task Manager) and they generate things with a huge amount of memory. When I had my viruses, they kept on making IEXPLORER.EXE which were 20K-70K+ and truely slowed my computer down, and also enabled popups. And the more the space is, the more is adds to your computer, and the slower it goes. So just to let you all know, that’s what really happens. And also remember, the virus doesn’t slow you down, it’s what it adds.

~Lin

A few ways to make it faster is by using disk clean up, disk defragmentor, or… GET MORE RAM!

or attaching c4 to it…
[/quote]
Uhhhhh, idk that much about computers, what’s c4?[/quote]

Read full topic
